nodes.bodyText:
What do you think about adding more explanation about ES authentication here? I guess not all the users know the auth feature of Elasticsearch. For example:
Elasticsearch doesn't pre-bundled security feature, but you can enable it by following the [guideline](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.x/configuring-security.html) to secure an Elasticsearch cluster.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -126,6 +126,20 @@ Connector Options String Delimiter for composite keys ("_" by default), e.g., "$" would result in IDs "KEY1$KEY2$KEY3"." + +
username
+ optional + (none) + String + Username used to connect to Elasticsearch instance.
